description: An item representing a numerical value.

value.description: The value (not necessarily numeric) associated with this Quantity.

e_value.description: Symmetric, one-sigma error associated with this Quantity's value.

e_upper_value.description: Upper (plus) one-sigma error on this Quantity's value.

e_lower_value.description: Lower (minus) one-sigma error on this Quantity's value.

upper_limit.description: Lower (minus) one-sigma error on this Quantity's value.

lower_limit.description: Lower (minus) one-sigma error on this Quantity's value.

derived.description: Whether or not this Quantity is derived from other parameters/observations.

description.description: Any additional descriptive/meta information about this quantity.

u_value.description: The units with which this Quantity's value is stored.

u_e_value.description: The units with which this Quantity's errors are stored.

title: quantity
